sentences.en: A clarinet and bassoon and other instruments start playing.
sentences.cn: 随后，单簧管，低音管和其它乐器也开始了演奏。

sentences.en: a trio for piano, oboe and bassoon
sentences.cn: 钢琴、双簧管及大管三重奏

sentences.cn: 降B大调 大管协奏曲(管弦乐奏版).

sentences.en: Concerto in C Bassoon and Piano.

sentences.cn: 托玛兹:C大调大管协奏曲(钢琴伴奏版).

sentences.cn: 巴哈:降E大调大管协奏曲(钢琴伴奏版).

sentences.en: Eccentric Fox - Trot in C for Bassoon Quartet.
sentences.cn: C大调古怪的狐步舞曲(为大管四重奏).

sentences.en: Fantasia in C Major for bassoon and piano.
sentences.cn: 布札:大管独奏-幻想曲(钢琴伴奏版).

sentences.en: Fantastic Symphony IV - March to the Scafford for Bassoon Quartet.
sentences.cn: 走向断头台 - 曲自幻想交响曲(为大管四重奏).

sentences.en: He tucked the bassoon under an arm and stamped out.
sentences.cn: 他把巴松管夹在腋下,跺着脚走了出去.

sentences.en: His brother is an outstanding bassoon player.
sentences.cn: 他的哥哥是一名出色的大管演奏家.

sentences.en: Or to reduce cost, bassoon span of purpose, reduce vacuum tube amount.
sentences.cn: 或者为了降低成本, 有意增大管间距, 减少真空管数量.

sentences.cn: G小调大管奏鸣曲(钢琴伴奏版).

sentences.cn: 卡伯瑞拉:G小调大管奏鸣曲(钢琴伴奏版).

sentences.cn: 格林卡:降B大调大管奏鸣曲(钢琴伴奏版).

sentences.en: The Wedding of the Painted Doll for Bassoon Quartet.
sentences.cn: 彩色洋娃娃的婚礼(为大管四重奏).

trans.tran_cn: （一种吹奏乐器）巴松管，低音管，巴松管吹奏者
trans.tran_en: a musical instrument like a very long wooden tube, that produces a low sound. You hold it upright and play it by blowing into a thin curved metal pipe.
